scripts.install-all: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start:
echo '
⚠️  WARNING: This only starts the backend server!
' && echo '✅ To start BOTH backend + frontend, use: npm run dev
' && echo '🌐 Then open: http://localhost:5173
' && cd server && npm start
